title: Nike Manufactory
desc:
Post 29
**Nike Manufactory**

Set: Duwiiton Inc.
Price: $700
Mortgage Value: $700

Rent: $200

Drive-By Effects:

- Owner gets 60% of the money whenever players buy items from this property.
